content:
Q: How do I redeem the free teleconsultation services?
A: If you have opted for the Enhanced Medical Benefits, you will receive an email from us to assist you to download an app in order to register for up to three (3) free teleconsultations each, for both you and your maid.
questions: What are the eligibility criteria and process for redeeming the free teleconsultation services under the Enhanced Medical Benefits, including who qualifies and how the registration is completed?
How many free teleconsultations are provided under the Enhanced Medical Benefits, and does this limit apply separately to the insured and their maid?
What steps must an insured take after opting for the Enhanced Medical Benefits to access the teleconsultation services, including any required communications or app downloads?
Does the free teleconsultation service cover both the insured individual and their maid equally, and are there any differences in the number of consultations or registration process?
Is there a specified timeframe within which the insured must redeem the free teleconsultation services after receiving the email, and what happens if this window is missed?
Are there any exclusions or conditions under the Enhanced Medical Benefits that would prevent an insured or their maid from using the free teleconsultation services?
What documentation or proof is required to verify eligibility for the free teleconsultation services under the Enhanced Medical Benefits?
If an insured has multiple maids, does the free teleconsultation benefit extend to all maids or only one, and how is this managed during registration?
How does the policy define the scope of teleconsultation services provided for free under the Enhanced Medical Benefits, including types of medical issues covered?
Are there any general policy exclusions that override or limit the use of the free teleconsultation services provided under the Enhanced Medical Benefits?
What happens if the insured or their maid requires more than three teleconsultationsâ€”are additional consultations covered or available at a cost?
Does the process of redeeming the free teleconsultation services require any pre-existing condition declarations or health screenings before registration?
How does the policy handle situations where the insured does not receive the email for app download after opting for the Enhanced Medical Benefits?
Are there any age restrictions or other eligibility limits for the insured or maid to qualify for the free teleconsultation services under the Enhanced Medical Benefits?
Does the teleconsultation service cover follow-up consultations related to the same medical condition, and how does this interact with the three-consultation limit?
Is the teleconsultation service accessible internationally or only within certain geographic locations as defined by the policy?
How does the policy address data privacy and security concerns related to the app used for teleconsultation registration and services?
Are there any conditions under which the insurer can revoke or suspend the free teleconsultation benefit after it has been granted?
Does the policy specify the types of healthcare professionals available through the teleconsultation service, and are there any limitations on specialist consultations?
How does the teleconsultation benefit under the Enhanced Medical Benefits interact with other medical benefits or coverage sections in the policy?
